response.original_title: Sink Your Teeth: A Tokyo Ghoul Celebration
response.overview: 6 select episodes from Season 1. Ken Kaneki is a loner. In a world where ghouls—human-like creatures who survive on human flesh—and people are at war, his biggest concern is which novel to pick up next. But when a date with the mysterious Rize turns deadly, a lifesaving operation horrifyingly transforms him into a human-ghoul hybrid. Can he find his place in a society where it’s hunt or be hunted?
response.title: Sink Your Teeth: A Tokyo Ghoul Celebration
